document_data.name: Geremis Dyrr
document_data.mainbody: '''Geremis Dyrr''' was an old member of [[House Agrach Dyrr]] of [[Menzoberranzan]] in [[1373 DR]].
document_data.History:
Geremis graduated from [[Sorcere]] at an unknown time and became an apprentice of the [[Dyrr|Lichdrow Dyrr]].

During the siege of Dyrr's compound for their betrayal of [[Menzoberranzan]] during the [[Siege of Menzoberranzan]], Geremis, bald and aging, was called back to his house together with all of Dyrr's other wizards to help raise magical defenses.<ref>
